home_job: Full stack web developer, Competitive Programmer.
about_desc: Hello there, I am Kanna Sandeep Raj, currently a final year undergraduate student at IIT Kharagpur pursuing Honors in Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering. I have a deep interest in developing software and doing Competitive Programming.
experience_0_overview: Slice is a fast growing fintech startup based in India and I worked as a SDE Intern in A2 pod of Slice for two months. I worked on two major projects there. Technologies worked on are TypeScript, Mongo DB, Node JS, Express JS, React Js, Material UI.
